commitMessage: feat: implement Add Video dialog with auto-title fetching
prBody:
Implemented the 'Add Video' dialog component.

- Created `src/lib/youtube.ts` for extracting YouTube IDs and fetching titles via noembed.com.
- Created `src/components/add-video-dialog.tsx` for the dialog UI.
- Updated `src/App.tsx` to include the dialog and toast notifications.
- Uses `localStorage` via existing storage utility to save videos.
notes: Verified with type check. `next-themes` is confirmed to be in package.json for sonner Toaster support.
